PageDescription: Get online editors for text documents, spreadsheets, and presentations to install on your own server.
OODocsEnterpriseText: Get the enterprise-ready office to connect it to the platform of your choice with <0>ready-to-use connectors</0>.
OODocsDeveloperText: Get online editors for text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, forms, and PDF and integrate them with your own platform using <0>API</0>.
OODocsDeveloperBanner: The trial version of ONLYOFFICE <0>Docs Developer</0> allows you to test all Docs features including <1>Access to Automation API</1> provided at an additional cost.
OODocsDeveloperBannerTooltip: A new API class that makes it possible to interact with text documents, spreadsheets, presentations and fillable forms from the outside.
OODocsCommunityText: Get online editors for text documents, spreadsheets, and presentations (packaged as Document Server) and integrate them with the platform of your choice.
OODocsCommunityBanner: Need more concurrent connections, mobile web editors, or professional technical assistance from the ONLYOFFICE team? Opt for <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs Enterprise</0>.
ForWindowsServer2012OrHigher: For Windows Server 2012 or higher (64-bit only)
GetTheLatestVersionOfOwnCloud: Get the latest version of ownCloud with ONLYOFFICE Docs pre-installed.
GetTheLatestVersionOfNextcloud: Get the latest version of Nextcloud with ONLYOFFICE editors pre-installed.
TryOODocsEnterprise: Try ONLYOFFICE Docs Enterprise locally <0>free for 30 days</0>
TryOODocsDeveloper: Try ONLYOFFICE Docs Developer locally <0>free for 30 days</0>
GetItNowText: By downloading/installing this software you agree to our <0>License agreement</0> and <1>Privacy statement</1>.
